snippet: The Rangers rushed out to a 4-0 lead in their win in Philadelphia, earning home-ice advantage for the first three rounds of the playoffs.
abstract: New York Rangers defeat Philadelphia Flyers, 5-3, to clinch Eastern Conference title.
lead_paragraph: The Rangers rushed out to a 4-0 lead in their win in Philadelphia, earning home-ice advantage for the first three rounds of the playoffs.

headline.seo: Rangers Clinch Conference Title, Sweeping Series Against Flyers
headline.main: Rangers Clinch Conference Title, Sweeping Series Against Flyers
headline.print_headline: True to Form, Rangers Clinch Conference Title
